titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Richmond before Queene Elizabeth of famous memorie, vpon the 28. of March, 1596. By the reuerend father in God Anthony Rudd, Doctor in Diuinitie, and Lord Bishop of S. Dauids
titleStmt.author: Rudd, Anthony, 1549 or 50-1615.
R. S., fl. 1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Some pages cropped at head, affecting page numbers.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
